resources.string:
This design pattern is one of the structural design pattern and its used so that two unrelated interface can work together. The object that join that joins these unrelated interface is called an Adapter.

Adapter pattern take two forms 
'CLASS ADAPTER' : utilize Java Inheritance. Class adapter extends the adoptee class (Using Interface) and adds desired methods to adapter. 
'OBJECT ADAPTER' : utilize Java Composition. The adapter object contains an adoptee and implements the target interface to interact with adoptee.
